title: The Theory of Everything (2014) 1080p (Nl sub) BluRay SAM TBS
description:
The Theory of Everything (2014)

Dutch
De film vertelt het verhaal over de beroemde natuurkundige Stephen
Hawking. Het verhaal centreert zich om Hawkings vroege jaren op de
Universiteit van Cambridge waar hij verliefd wordt op de arts-studente
Jane, waar hij later mee trouwt. Net na het huwelijk wordt bij Hawking
ALS, een ongeneeslijke spierziekte, gediagnosticeerd.

English
The Theory of Everything is the story of the most brilliant and
celebrated physicist of our time, Stephen Hawking, and Jane Wilde the
arts student he fell in love with whilst studying at Cambridge in the
1960s. Little was expected from Stephen Hawking, a bright but shiftless
student of cosmology, given just two years to live following the
diagnosis of a fatal illness at 21 years of age. He became galvanized,
however, by the love of fellow Cambridge student, Jane Wilde, and he went
on to be called the successor to Einstein, as well as a husband and father
to their three children. Over the course of their marriage as Stephen's
body collapsed and his academic renown soared, fault lines were exposed
that tested the lineaments of their relationship and dramatically altered
the course of both of their lives.
